text:
Danna Paola Rivera Munguía (born 23 June 1995), better known as Danna Paola, is a Mexican actress, singer and model.
In 2004, she was chosen as the lead in the successful children's series, "Amy, la niña de la mochila azul". She starred in multiple television series produced by Televisa.
In 2009, she was cast as "Patito" in "Atrévete a Soñar", the Mexican remake of the popular Argentine children's telenovela, Patito Feo.
In late 2010, she voiced "Rapunzel" for the Latin American Spanish-language dubbing of the Disney movie "Tangled".

annotations.surface_form: Amy, la niña de la mochila azul
